attributes.action: Start an enquiry into why fuel prices are so high.
attributes.additional_details: Coincidence that the government is making red diesel illegal from April, I doubt it. There's more to this and the public deserve this looked into.
attributes.background: Fuel prices are sky high at the moment and majority of the public do not believe that it has anything to do with the war in Ukraine as we're being told. Why is the price gap between petrol and diesel so big?

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603624
